ygData.subject: Re: feign death
ygData.msgSnippet: i havent tried that, but it should work, because monks can kite with feign death.  be sure you dont have autoattack on, however.  on a side note, i know my
ygData.messageBody:
i havent tried that, but it should work, because monks can kite with feign
death. be sure you dont have autoattack on, however. on a side note, i
know my experience may be different than others, but i have always found
feign death to be a worthless spell, as the creatures are never fooled by
it, and then i cant even run or cast(click walk, get up, turn around, and
creep away because you have 3hp left). also, it has a rather high mana cost
for a lower lvl caster.

my 2cp
belphenor


>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
>Out of curiosity, Has anyone tried to stack DoT's then feign death.
>Should that not do the extra damage since the monster would be withing
>melee range for more then 18 seconds and not moving.
>I was thinking something like DoT's feign death, wait, get up, shadow
>step, DoT' feign death, critter dead.
>Now, does DoT make the critter see through feign death??
>
>Darkmoon level 15 necromancer
>
>Just trying to think of new strategies for using my spells from level
>16. Besides, what else am I going to do at work. ;)
